channel.title: Quotas on Jack Note
channel.description: Recent content in Quotas on Jack Note

item.title: Enable Quotas AlmaLinux 9 Directadmin
item.author: me@example.com (jvergara)
item.description:
Please try running this command:

grubby --args="rootflags=uquota,pquota" --update-kernel=ALL

and then reboot your server. After that check if the XFS quota is OK.
item.content:encoded:
Please try running this command:

grubby --args="rootflags=uquota,pquota" --update-kernel=ALL

and then reboot your server. After that check if the XFS quota is OK.
